Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 27th overall pick, by New York in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Eduardo Marpons (BRO)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/1/2015, off William Halsey (BRO)...
Injured on 5/22/2015 with a Herniated Disc Back, out for 7 weeks...
8/14/2015: Signed a contract extension with New York , $20,000,000 per year, for 5 years.
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/2015, hitting .313 with 10 HR, 19 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/10/2016, hitting .423 with 3 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/29/2016, hitting .400 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Houston on 6/14/2016...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/17/2016 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Sets a new season NL-Record for HR with 41 on 10/2/2016...
Injured on 6/7/2017 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/1/2017 with a Bruised Ribs, out for one week...
Drove in 6 runs against Houston on 8/29/2017...
Traded from New York to Houston on 4/21/2018 (Going to HOU: CF Craig Parkhill, P Greg Dunkley, P Alfonso Yaquet. Going to NY: P Roy Fisk)...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/2018, hitting .317 with 10 HR, 19 RBI...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Houston in 2018...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/24/2019, hitting .381 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/2019, hitting .310 with 7 HR, 18 RBI...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against St. Louis (B) on 9/1/2019...
Won MVP in 2019, hitting .289 with 41 HR, 117 RBI...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
8/14/2020: Signed a contract extension with Houston, $20,000,000 per year, for 4 years.
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/10/2021, hitting .346 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Traded from Houston to Cincinnati on 5/11/2022 (Going to HOU: P John Henriques, 2B Steven Mora, 3B Edward Washington, P Richard Maddocks, P Tony Amaral. Going to CIN: CF Craig Parkhill)...
Injured on 5/20/2022 with a Strained Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 9/9/2022 with a Tender Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Cincinnati to Boston on 2/4/2023 (Going to CIN: P Michael Ramirez, LF Maximo Obrien. Going to BOS: CF Craig Parkhill, P Greg Dunkley)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/1/2023, hitting .462 with 2 HR, 4 RBI...
Was selected to the 2024 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/19/2024 with a Torn Calf Muscle, out for full season...
Drove in 11 runs against Seattle on 8/19/2024...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (B) on 2/8/2025 to a 1-year deal worth $15,000,000 per year...
Won World Series with St. Louis (B) in 2025...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/4/2026 to a 1-year deal worth $5,000,000 per year...
